mainText:
Steve Jobs has passed away. One of my favorite quotes from him has been "make
a ding in the Universe". He indeed made a ding in mine. In my humble opinion
amongst his many many assets, his greatest was his "instinct". Like Wayne
Gretzky said once, "to anticipate where the puck was going to be". I would
not eulogize him with big words. Just that I have total admiration and love
for this man.  No I did not get to live in the time of Henry Ford. I did more
than make up though by living in the time of Steve Jobs

   -
      -
author: Atul
